column5: Marketing plays a central role in companies' strategic planning, determining what products or services may be of interest to customers and the strategy to use in sales, communications and business development.Our MSc Marketing provides a comprehensive understanding of the relevance and necessity of marketing and insight into the marketing decision-making process. You will be introduced to:marketing theorymarketing mixescurrent issues and future trends of marketing.At the same time, you will engage with a number of relevant issues, including:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
